title: cli configuration
description: Defines configuration to be used with cli

url.description: Initial URL to start recording from

workdir.description: Directory where logs (eg: jtl files) and other relevant data is stored

urlIncludes.description:
Regular expressions used to only record requests with matching URLs.
NOTE: Don't include scheme (e.g: http://) in regex

urlExcludes.description:
Regular expressions used to NOT record requests with matching URLs.
NOTE: Don't include scheme (e.g: http://) in regex

urlIgnoreDefaultFilter.description: Specifies to use or not the default URL filter. The default filter ignores URLs matching: (?i).*\.(bmp|css|js|gif|ico|jpe?g|png|svg|swf|ttf|woff2?|webp)(\?.*)?

headerExcludes.description: Regular expressions used to ignore matching headers from recording

headerIgnoreDefaultFilter.description: Specifies to use or not the default headers filter. The default filter ignores these headers: Accept-Language,Upgrade-Insecure-Requests,Accept-Encoding,User-Agent,Accept,Referer,Origin,X-Requested-With,Cache-Control
